name: Hyspherical 2
description: Hyspherical 2 is an acutely tricky puzzle game where you must time dropping perfect circles onto different shapes. Sounds easy, but timing is everything and Geometry has never been simple to master!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 support Storage: 350 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Great puzzle game and I'm enjoying it a lot. You place spheres inside shapes and must be careful so the spheres don't collide. Very fun and really hard. Totally worth it's price. Money well spent. So very recommended! 10/10
